title: Parking Near a Fire Hall
summary: Prohibits parking within 30 meters of a fire hall or adjacent property, where signage indicates.

title: Parking Near Parks and Playgrounds
summary: Prohibits parking on roads adjacent to parks or playgrounds where indicated by signage.

title: Parking Near a Dead End
summary: Prohibits parking within 15 meters of the end of the roadway on a dead-end street.

title: Parking on Narrow Roadways
summary: Prohibits parking on roadways less than 6 meters wide where signage indicates restrictions.

title: Parking Certain Commercial Motor Vehicles
summary: Prohibits parking of large commercial vehicles exceeding 2.6 meters in width or 7 meters in length, except in industrial areas or designated loading zones.

title: Parking Prohibited When Control Device Covered
summary: Prohibits parking in a space if the parking meter or control device is covered, indicating non-availability.

title: Fees for Parking
summary: Requires vehicles to pay applicable parking fees in designated metered spaces.

title: Counterfeit Parking Payment
summary: Prohibits depositing unauthorized substitutes for valid parking payments into parking meters or control devices.
